author: PixelTracksAlpaka
body:
#### PR description:

This PR stems from #41117 and it's the 7th of a series of smaller PRs.  

- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41282
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43295
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41285
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41286
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41287
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41288
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43294

It includes all the workflows to run pixel tracks in Alpaka (Run3 and Phase2).
 
This PR requires all the PRs above before it in the list to properly work.

### Physics Validation

- [Run3 HLT](https://adiflori.web.cern.ch/adiflori/alpaka_prof/jan24_review/run3_hlt/)
- [Run3 Pixel Only - quadruplets](https://adiflori.web.cern.ch/adiflori/alpaka_prof/jan24_review/run3_quads/)
- [Run3 Pixel Only - triplets](https://adiflori.web.cern.ch/adiflori/alpaka_prof/jan24_review/run3_trips/)
title: Pixel Alpaka Migration: Configs and Fixes [VII]
